title: XDM Business Marketing List Members
description: Members/Persons/Contacts etc. associated with a marketing list.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

marketingListMemberID.title: Marketing List Member ID
marketingListMemberID.description: Unique ID for the membership of this person to this marketing list.

marketingListMemberKey.title: Marketing List Member Key
marketingListMemberKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the membership of this person from the marketing list.

personID.title: Person Identifier
personID.description: Unique ID for the person who is a member of this marketing list.

personKey.title: Person Key
personKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Person from the marketing list.

marketingListID.title: Marketing List Identifier
marketingListID.description: Unique ID for the marketing list this person is a member of.

marketingListKey.title: Marketing List Key
marketingListKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Marketing List this person is a member of.
